title: User Account - Mobile Device Setup (MDM)
description: A new executive needs their new company-issued iPhone set up and enrolled in Mobile Device Management (MDM).

tasks.description: Guide the user through the initial iPhone setup process until they reach the Remote Management screen.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user is ready for enrollment.

tasks.description: Have the user log in with their corporate credentials to enroll the device in the MDM system.
Verify in the MDM console that the device is now managed and that security policies are being applied.
tasks.expected_outcome: The device appears in the MDM console as compliant.
